file.title: Anchor

p.text: Anchor helps to arrange objects in the window when sizes of window are changed by the user.

p.textAll: You can anchor an objet to some edge of the window and when sizes are changed the object is following that edge. All available anchors are described in Quick fill words -> Anchors.

sample.sampletitle: Variants of how button anchors can be set:
sample.samplecode: Window1.Button1.Anchor = "On left" Window1.Button1.Anchor = Right_top_bottom Window1.Button1.Anchor = Window1.Button2.Anchor Window1.Button1.Anchor = Window1.Text1.Text
